Specimen Type: Blood, urine, tissue, and other biological specimens
Purpose: To provide detailed instructions for the analytical phase of generating accurate, reliable, and timely test results in compliance with CLIA requirements.
Container: Appropriate specimen containers for each specimen type (e.g., blood collection tubes, sterile urine cups, formalin containers for tissue)
Equipment: Spectrophotometers, ELISA readers, PCR machines, and other analyzers
